messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:  Charlotte Mason/Drawing
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/25/00 7:53:20 AM Eastern Standard Time, OPHELIA637@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/25/00 7:53:20 AM Eastern Standard Time,
OPHELIA637@... writes:

<< We just moved to a farm from the city so we
are very excited to experience everything in nature. The wild turkey
were in the compost yesterday and the dear have made great trails
through the woods. >>
Stephanie,
I am sooooo jealous! That sounds do great to me. Years ago, in my first
marriage, an aunt and uncle had a farm outside of Knoxville Tenn. They had
acres and acres, a horse and a property that had a stream running thru it,
and as you crossed that stream, you gradually went up hill to a great wooded
area where you and the horse could rest. I used to go out there and just
ride all day. I wish my boys could have that experience. Your family is
really going to have such fun, especially will all that wild life about.
Teresa
